page.title: 10Local Industries.
page.content: The local{light manufacturing}and {service industries}rely on proximity to{A13}or{A127.}At{Hadleigh,}along the A13, are services such as printing and finishing,shopfitting,cleaning,dental ceramics besides firms producing light engineering products. SOGAT,the print workers trade union has its H.Q. here. The{Progress Road}industrial estate adjacent to the A127 houses some 53 firms:light engineering; tool-making; sheet metal working;the manufacturing of kitchen furniture, packaging,signs, plastics,surgical appliances,veneers, shoes and joinery products; printing; repairing of cars and distribution of frozen food,roofing supplies,and toys. There are also a number of small work shops in midst of residential areas such as Glendale Gardens in Leigh and there are 3 small concerns among the woodland grazing plots in the north.
